title: Maya World Trade and Power: An Alternative Maya World History Adventure
description: Second book set in the Maya World..In a world of steam and airships, Maitland Industries needs more iron and nickel.Jim Maitland sets off on the airship Sprite, back to his lover Kes in Kuching. Events interrupt the trip,he gets caught in the troubles in Yorkville where the hipostles Bob Zim and Dave Ronk take a stand.Marie surveys the White City and it comes alive.Jim, Kes, Marie and Brent start a new adventure.The secrets of the White City become clearer.A revolution is planned.Arnold gets a makeover.Power grows for Maitland Industries and Kuching Berhad.
author: Chris   Harte
